long_description: Made from a comfortable blend of hemp and recycled polyester, the practical Isis Sahara Jacket has classic tailoring for everyday wear. Hemp is 3 times stronger than cotton for longer wear; recycled polyester ensures next-to-skin comfort. A touch of Lycra(R) spandex helps garment stretch and move gracefully with you. Button front closure; sleeves roll up and secure with button-closure tabs. Stash your keys, wallet and phone in the twin front welt pockets; stash small items in the shoulder zip security pocket. Closeout.
short_description: Made from a comfortable blend of hemp and recycled polyester, the practical Isis Sahara Jacket has classic tailoring for everyday wear.
